resources.string:
The car park names and locations are obtained from York Open Data:/
 http://data.yorkopendata.org/
(Contains public sector information licensed under the Open Government Licence v2.0.:/
 http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/open-government-licence/version/2/)

Additional information is obtained from the York Council Car Parks Directory:/
 https://www.york.gov.uk/directory/14/car_parks_directory
